metadata.Title: CVE-2019-13287 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: In Xpdf 4.01.01, there is an out-of-bounds read vulnerability in thefunction SplashXPath::strokeAdjust() located at splash/SplashXPath.cc. Itcan, for example, be triggered by sending a crafted PDF document to thepdftoppm tool. It might allow an attacker to cause Information Disclosure.This is related to CVE-2018-16368.

criterions.comment: xpdf: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
